channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #79 – Game Mechanics – Breaking Down An Endless Runner Style Game

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.content:encoded:
Here are links to the endless runner games I have created with Corona SDK:

Flappy Fruit Bat

Flappy Fruit Bat Free

Jumping Jelly Free

Peppy The Penguin Airborne

item.title: By: Norvin
item.dc:creator: Norvin
item.description:
I've done an infinite runner in Corona SDK too. :) check it out.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rainbirth.dolphin
I took me 2 months of work, and treats most of the aspects of an infinite runner.
